Paraglobe

Paragliding adventures

Ready to take your adventure to new heights? Join our exhilarating paragliding expeditions and experience the pure freedom of flight! Whether you're a first-time flyer or a seasoned pilot, our handpicked destinations promise breathtaking views and unforgettable thrills. Step beyond your comfort zone, embrace the sky, and create memories that will last a lifetime. The journey of a lifetime begins hereâ€”are you ready?

Contact & Booking

Summer 2025

Pokhara | Nepal

Discover gentle thermals, smooth landings, and incredible Himalayan views over Phewa Lake. Perfect for tandem flights, training, and relaxed scenic flying.

  • 07.04 - 21.04.25
  • Beginner-Friendly
  • 2,568

Annecy | France

Annecy offers gentle thermals, stunning lake views, and smooth landings. Perfect for learning thermal flying and improving gliding control.

  • 02.06 - 12.06.25
  • Beginner-Friendly
  • 1,963

Owens Valley | USA

One of the world's strongest thermal locations with high-altitude flying. Perfect for extreme XC and mountain flying experts.

  • 15.07 - 30.07.25
  • Advanced & Expert
  • 3,586

Annecy | France

Annecy offers gentle thermals, stunning lake views, and smooth landings. Perfect for learning thermal flying and improving gliding control.

  • 02.08 - 16.08.25
  • Beginner-Friendly
  • 2,090

Winter 2025

Quixada | Brasil

Legendary cross-country site with insane thermals and the potential for 500+ km flights. Perfect for pilots chasing distance records and strong conditions.

  • 10.10 - 25.10.25
  • Advanced & Expert
  • 3,056

Bariloche | Argentina

Stunning alpine landscapes with moderate thermals and unpredictable weather. Perfect for exploring mountainous terrain and improving landing precision.

  • 10.11 - 24.11.25
  • Intermediate
  • 3,265

Bir Billing | India

Discover reliable thermals, moderate turbulence, and long XC flying potential. It is perfect for pilots looking to improve their thermal flying and cross-country skills.

  • 15.11 - 03.12.25
  • Intermediate
  • 4,569

Porterville | South Africa

Consistent high-altitude thermals and challenging cross-country routes. Perfect for expert pilots pushing long-distance XC flights.

  • 12.12 - 27.12.25
  • Advanced & Expert
  • 2,098
